nodes.text: Wing was a human male who resided in the city Calodan on the planet of Corvus. After a battle in the city resulted in the overthrowing of the ruthless Magistrate Morgan Elsbeth, Wing was instated as governor of the citizens.

Wing debuted in "Chapter 13: The Jedi" from the second season of the television series The Mandalorian, which was written and directed by Dave Filoni and released on Disney+ on November 27, 2020. Credited as "Governor Wing," he was played by Wing Tao Chao, an architect and Disney Legend from Walt Disney Imagineering.[source?]
